p:
Pradhan et al. (
3 ) and Khattab and Zeitoun (
14 ), using supercritical CO 2 as a solvent for linseed oil extraction, at 3·10 7 Pa and 50 °C for 3 h and 4·10 7 Pa and 50 °C for 2 h obtained 35.3 and 36.5% yield, respectively. Zanqui et al. (
2 ) obtained the highest yield (28.8%) of linseed oil extracted with subcritical propane at 60 °C and 1.2·10 7 Pa for 5 h.
